title: New: Liv Dawson – Open Your Eyes
body:
Fresh from a support slot with HONNE, alongside announcing her debut headline show at [OMEARA](http://www.

omearalondon.com/) in February next year, eighteen year old **Liv Dawson** is quite rightly building a steady stream of plaudits. Her latest track _Open Your Eyes_, the final cut lifted from her debut EP, sees Disclosure’s Guy Lawrence on production duties, and is perhaps her most ‘hit-worthy’ to date, whilst still managing to keep the focus on her magnificent vocal. Check it out below. Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
